content: **a free version of this pattern is available on the elimee designs website here 1 or on youtube here 2 ** imagine yourself walking into an organised and clutter-free room complete with our lovely and functional scraptacular baskets in every corner these baskets will add a unique touch to your space and are environmentally conscious creations made from scrap yarn and designed to reduce waste they will be a wonderful reminder of all of the beautiful projects that you have made which lead you to have a pile of scrap yarn in the first place these scrap-busting crochet baskets would make a fabulous gift because they are not only beautiful but functional and eco-friendly too whether you re looking for a unique gift for a friend or family member or simply want to be environmentally conscious these baskets are the perfect choice you may sell the items that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only if you have any questions or suggestions regarding this pattern please feel free to contact me via hello@elimeedesigns co uk or our elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 3 if you d like to be in the know when our next pattern is released blog post is shared or giveaway is launched be sure to sign up to our newsletter here 4 1 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/the-scraptacular-baskets 2 https //linktw in/jcludi 3 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 4 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
